meaningMnemonic: The <radical>leader</radical>'s <radical>key</radical> is the key that <kanji>make</kanji>s all the other keys. It's sort of like the one ring to rule them all, the one ring to bind them... except with keys.
readingMnemonic: The leader <kanji>make</kanji>s all the keys and puts them in a <reading>sack</reading> (さく) to distribute them to the underlings, who then <reading>saw</reading> (さ) them into shape.
